it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.spot.repo

Interface SpotRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RamSpotRepository

    public interface SpotRepository
    SpotRepository allows to retrieve metadata referring to a spot, i.e., a piece of text referring to one or more entities.
    Author:
    Diego Ceccarelli Created on Sep 10, 2012
    See Also:
    Spot

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Spot getSpot(java.lang.String spot)
      Given the a piece of text, the method will return a Spot if the given text is associated to one or more entities.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpot

        Spot getSpot(java.lang.String spot)
        Given the a piece of text, the method will return a Spot if the given text is associated to one or more entities. Otherwise, it will return null.
        Parameters:
        spot - - a piece of text possibly referring to one or more entities
        Returns:
        a Spot object containing several informations about the spot and the possible entities linked by the spot, null if the string is not referring to any entity
